handles.description: Twitter handles to scrape. Instead of full URLs, just provide the username. Example: ['Apify', 'OpenAI'].

tweetsDesired.description: Maximum number of tweets to scrape per profile. Must be an integer. Example: 100.

addUserInfo.description: Whether to include additional user information in the dataset. True to include, false to exclude. Example: true.

startUrls.description: Direct URLs to scrape. Can also upload a text file with list of URLs. Example: ['https://twitter.com/username'].

useApifyProxy.description: Whether to use Apify's proxy. Must be set to true or false. Example: true.

description: JSON object schema for Apify TripAdvisor Actor. Ensure 'proxyConfig' is always provided.
